column1: Little Goat Diner////This used to be one of my favorite places to go and take people visiting
column2: but the service has really declined.  I went today with a group of girls around 4:15.  When we arrived
column3: there were 7 seats available at the communal tables and no one waiting.  Over the course of 20 minutes
column4: an additional 10 people got up.  Instead of seating us
column5: the hostess got an attitude with us and proceeded to seat every other party without a reservation walking through the doors.  I was disappointed to give my friends that experience of Chicago.  They remarked how rude she was.  We went across the street to find a table easily at Bar Sienna.  I'm not sure I'll be back... Especially not with visitors to Chicago.
